## ClusterClient.callWithInternalUser property

Calls specified endpoint with provided clientParams on behalf of the Kibana internal user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callWithInternalUser: (endpoint: string, clientParams?: Record<string, any>, options?: CallAPIOptions | undefined) => Promise<any>;
```
